description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Toast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Toast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g frozen raw peeled prawn meat

recipeInstructions.text: Add enough vegetable oil to a wok or frying pan to reach a depth of 6cm. Heat over medium heat (to test when oil is ready, a cube of bread will turn golden brown in 15 seconds). Carefully place a few toasts into the oil, prawn-side down, and cook for 1 minute. Turn over and cook for 30 seconds or until golden. Drain on paper towel. Serve with soy sauce or sweet chilli sauce.

Serve with soy sauce or sweet chilli sauce.
